Hello All, 

${object.user_id.name} has created a New HP Application ${object.hp_id}.
Following are the details : 

  • HP Application ID : ${object.hp_id}
  • Applicant Name : % if object.partner_id.parent_id: ${object.partner_id.parent_id.name} ,${object.partner_id.name} % else : ${object.partner_id.name} % endif
  • Purpose of HP : ${object.name}
  • Amount of HP Requried : ${object.req_amt}

Due Deligence team may initiate the process of collecting / Verifying required documents to process HP. 

Thank you,

Dear ${object.partner_id.name}

Greetings from ${object.company_id.name}
${object.hp_id} has been approved. Please note that further processing of your HP application would be subject to the terms and conditions mentioned in this mail. Request you to acknowledge and reply with a confirmation, reading 'OK' from your official mail id. 
HP details : 

  • HP Amount Approved : ${object.hp_amount}
  • HP Type : ${object.hp_type.name}
  • Rate of Interest : ${object.interest_rate}
  • Processing Fee : ${object.process_fee}
  • HP Tenure (In Months) : ${object.total_installment}
  • Repayment Frequency : ${object.payment_freq}
  • EMI (Based On Sanctioned Amt ) : ${object.emi_cal}

Thank you for choosing ${object.company_id.name} as your financial partner for your lending needs. We do believe that we offer superior product offerings that will best serve your need.

Thank you,
